direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve modifying the map by removing elements, though clear removes all elements while removeMapping removes a specific mapping.
Both methods modify the internal state of the map, though clear removes all elements and put adds a new element.
Both methods involve modifying the map, though clear removes all elements and putAll adds multiple elements from another map.
Both methods involve handling the internal state of the map, though clear modifies the current state and readObject initializes the state from a serialized stream.
Both methods involve handling the internal state of the map, though clear modifies the current state and writeObject serializes the state to a stream.
